TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit Substitution extends System.Web.UI.Control

summary.span: 指定缓存输出的网页上的一个部分，该网页不受缓存限制。

span.span: Specifies a section on an output-cached Web page that is exempt from caching.

summary.span: 在此位置为 控件检索和替换动态内容。

span.span: At this location, dynamic content is retrieved and substituted for the control.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 本主题内容：In this topic: - [介绍Introduction](#introduction) - [声明性语法Declarative Syntax](#declarative_syntax) ## 介绍Introduction 使用控件指定在输出缓存 Web 页上要动态内容的部分替换为控件。Use the control to specify a section on an output-cached Web page where you want dynamic content substituted for the control. 控件提供了在其中缓存内容的大多数页面的部分页面缓存一简化的解决方案。The control offers a simplified solution to partial page caching for pages where the majority of the content is cached. 您可以输出缓存整个页面，然后使用控件可以指定从缓存中免除的页面部分。You can output-cache the entire page, and then use controls to specify the parts of the page that are exempt from caching. 缓存的区域只执行一次，直至缓存项过期或被清除重播缓存中。Cached regions execute only once and are replayed from the cache until the cache entry expires or is purged. 动态区域执行每次请求页面。Dynamic regions execute each time the page is requested. 此缓存模型简化了对网页进行主要是静态的因为您不需要封装到缓存中的 Web 用户控件的部分代码。This caching model simplifies the code for pages that are primarily static, because you do not have to encapsulate the sections to cache in Web user controls. 例如，此缓存模型可在方案中必须包含静态内容，例如新闻故事的页面和一个显示播发的控件。For example, this caching model is useful in a scenario where you have a page that contains static content, such as news stories, and an control that displays advertisements. 不更改新闻报道，这意味着它们可以被缓存。The news stories do not change, which means that they can be cached. 但是，用户请求页上，每次想要显示新的播发。However, each time a user requests the page, you want to display a new advertisement. 控件直接支持缓存后替换并呈现页面发回，而不考虑是否缓存页的新播发每次。The control directly supports post-cache substitution and renders a new advertisement each time the page posts back, regardless of whether the page is cached. > [!NOTE] > 可以将放置中缓存的页面中包含的用户控件的控件。You can place a control in a user control that is contained in a cached page. 但是，不能在输出缓存用户控件中的控件。However, you cannot place a control in an output-cached user control. 当控件执行时，它调用一个方法，返回的字符串。When the control executes, it calls a method that returns a string. 该方法返回的字符串是要显示的位置处的页面上的内容控件。The string that the method returns is the content to display on the page at the location of the control. 使用属性来指定要时调用的回调方法的名称控件执行。Use the property to specify the name of the callback method to invoke when the control executes. 您指定的回调方法必须是包含在页面或用户控件上的静态方法控件。The callback method that you specify must be a static method on the page or user control that contains the control. 回调方法的签名必须匹配的签名该委托使用参数并返回一个字符串。The signature for the callback method must match the signature for an delegate that takes an parameter and returns a string. 若要操作的页面输出缓存，可以使用[@ OutputCache](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/28a9e101-fb44-4198-9cb6-b8a52312fec2)指令类，或属性。To manipulate the output cache for a page, you can use the [@ OutputCache](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/28a9e101-fb44-4198-9cb6-b8a52312fec2) directive, the class, or the property. 缓存页的详细信息，请参阅[缓存 ASP.NET 页面](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/e9666a1b-88df-4931-af0b-a754fc65660b(v=vs.100))并[缓存部分 ASP.NET 页面的](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/cdd8e523-7305-4685-a456-c5be1de1367e)。For more information on caching pages, see [Caching ASP.NET Pages](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/e9666a1b-88df-4931-af0b-a754fc65660b(v=vs.100)) and [Caching Portions of an ASP.NET Page](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/cdd8e523-7305-4685-a456-c5be1de1367e). 为使用的替代方法控件，您还可以获取缓存行为使用替换委托。As an alternative to using the control, you can also get substitution caching behavior using a delegate. 此外，可以获得如缓存行为在控件上，替换控件，直接支持此功能。In addition, you can get substitution caching behavior on controls, such as the control, that directly support this feature. 有关详细信息，请参阅[动态更新的缓存页的某些部分](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/09c9bd9a-0d68-4a5c-aa6f-1b461c208795)。For more information, see [Dynamically Updating Portions of a Cached Page](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/09c9bd9a-0d68-4a5c-aa6f-1b461c208795). ## 声明性语法Declarative Syntax ``` ``` ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何添加以声明方式到输出缓存 Web 页的控件。The following code example demonstrates how to add a control declaratively to an output-cached Web page. 加载页时向用户在标签中显示当前日期和时间。When the page loads, the current date and time are displayed to the user in a label. 本部分的页面缓存并更新仅每隔 60 秒。This section of the page is cached and updated only every 60 seconds. 当控件执行时，它将调用`GetCurrentDateTime`方法。When the control executes, it calls the `GetCurrentDateTime` method. 返回的字符串`GetCurrentDateTime`向用户显示。The string returned by `GetCurrentDateTime` is displayed to the user. 此部分中的页未缓存，并更新每次刷新页面。This section of the page is not cached and is updated each time the page is refreshed. [!code-aspx-csharp[SubstitutionsClass1#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/SubstitutionsClass1/CS/substitutionclass1cs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[SubstitutionsClass1#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/SubstitutionsClass1/VB/substitutionclass1vb.aspx#1)]

summary.span: 初始化 类的新实例。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用构造函数来创建和初始化的新实例类。Use the constructor to create and initialize a new instance of the class. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何添加以编程方式向输出缓存网页的控件。The following code example demonstrates how to add a control programmatically to an output-cached Web page. 加载页时向用户在标签中显示当前日期和时间。When the page loads, the current date and time are displayed to the user in a label. 本部分的页面缓存并更新仅每隔 60 秒。This section of the page is cached and updated only every 60 seconds. 当控件执行时，它将调用`GetCurrentDateTime`方法。When the control executes, it calls the `GetCurrentDateTime` method. 返回的字符串`GetCurrentDateTime`向用户显示。The string returned by `GetCurrentDateTime` is displayed to the user. 此部分中的页未缓存，并更新每次刷新页面。This section of the page is not cached and is updated each time the page is refreshed. [!code-aspx-csharp[SubstitutionCstr#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/SubstitutionCstr/CS/substitutioncstrcs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[SubstitutionCstr#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/SubstitutionCstr/VB/substitutioncstrvb.aspx#1)]

summary.span: 返回一个 对象，该对象指示 控件不支持子控件。

span.span: Returns an object, indicating that the control does not support child controls.
An , indicating that the control does not support child controls.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法通常用于创建对象来存储控件的子控件。The method is typically used to create a object to store the child controls for a control. 实现方法控件始终返回对象，以指示控件不支持子控件。The implementation of the method for a control always returns an object, to indicate that the control does not support child controls.

para.span: 当扩展控件，可重写中派生的类，以支持子控件的方法。

span.span: When extending the control, you can override the method in a derived class to support child controls.

related.span: 替代 Web 服务器控件

.property instance string MethodName
Public Overridable Property MethodName As String

member this.MethodName : string with get, set

summary.span: 获取或设置要在 控件执行时调用的回调方法的名称。

span.span: Gets or sets the name of the callback method to invoke when the control executes.

value.span: 字符串，表示要在 控件执行时调用的方法的名称。

span.span: A string that represents the name of the method to invoke when the control executes.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用属性来指定要时调用的回调方法的名称控件执行。Use the property to specify the name of the callback method to invoke when the control executes. 您指定的回调方法必须是包含在页面或用户控件上的静态方法控件。The callback method that you specify must be a static method on the page or user control that contains the control. 回调方法的签名必须匹配的签名该委托使用参数并返回一个字符串。The signature for the callback method must match the signature for a delegate that takes an parameter and returns a string. 回调方法返回的字符串是要显示的位置处的页面上的内容控件。The string that the callback method returns is the content to display on the page at the location of the control. 参数封装有关单个 HTTP 请求的所有 HTTP 特定信息。The parameter encapsulates all HTTP-specific information about an individual HTTP request. 可用于访问会话变量、 授权信息和个性化设置的详细信息。You can use it to access session variables, authorization information, and personalization details. 有关详情，请参阅。For more information, see . ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何添加以声明方式到输出缓存 Web 页的控件。The following code example demonstrates how to add a control declaratively to an output-cached Web page. 加载页时向用户显示静态的项目符号列表。When the page loads, a static bulleted list is displayed to the user. 本部分的页面缓存并更新仅每隔 60 秒。This section of the page is cached and updated only every 60 seconds. 当控件执行时，它将调用`GetUser`方法，它将返回一个字符串，表示当前用户。When the control executes, it calls the `GetUser` method, which returns a string that represents the current user. 此字符串显示在的位置页上的控件。This string is displayed at the location of the control on the page. 此部分中的页未缓存，并更新每次刷新页面。This section of the page is not cached and is updated each time the page is refreshed. [!code-aspx-csharp[Substitution.MethodName#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/Substitution.MethodName/CS/substitution.methodnamecs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[Substitution.MethodName#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/Substitution.MethodName/VB/substitution.methodnamevb.aspx#1)]

span.span: Sends server control content to a provided object, which writes the content to be rendered on the clien
